Name: SokoMage
About the game: SokoMage Stop Pads - Stops the rock from moving regardless of the incoming direction Directional Pads - Redirects the rock to the facing direction of the arrow Key Features - 30 levels to explore. You choose! - Many ways to complete the same puzzle. - Beautiful pixel graphics. - Captivating and interesting puzzles. - The controls are simple and accessible.
